note.p: Daughter of Susanna Ann and William Ervin Griffin, farmer, of Eye, Northamptonshire. Married John Walker Buckle (1824–82), bailiff, of Keston, Kent, in Paston, Northamptonshire, in 1853.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1747/676/33), 1861 (RG9/462/101/4)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 December 2019)
Northamptonshire, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1912 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 December 2019)
Northamptonshire, England, Church of England marriages, 1754–1912 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 December 2019)
